Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Array of data rows, or map of rows. Change using msg.payload.

Per column key to index into row map. Change using msg.columns.

Array of column labels. Change using msg.labels.

Array of column alignments (left, center, right). Change using msg.align.

Boolean or array of columns to make table/columns clickable. Change using msg.click.

Boolean or array of columns to allow sorting by column. Change using msg.sort.
